languages.text: "Леди Теодора... Морт... пали от руки той, что должна защищать слуг Бога-Императора. Я ни секунды не сомневался в безопасности крови фон Валанциус, когда ты была подле... но теперь, кажется, попраны все устои, на которых зиждется власть Вольных Торговцев, дарованная им Самим". {n}Абеляр взирает на Ардженту с выражением абсолютной ненависти, не прикрытой ни вежливостью, ни уважением.{/n}

"Lady Theodora... Mort... fell at the hand of the one meant to protect the servants of the God-Emperor. I never doubted the security of the von Valancius bloodline when you were close, but now the very foundations on which the power of the Rogue Traders rests seem to have been violated." {n}Abelard looks at Argenta with a visceral loathing in his eyes, uncovered by either courtesy or respect.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Леди Теодора... Морт... пали от руки той, что должна защищать слуг Бога-Императора. Я ни секунды не сомневался в безопасности крови фон Валанциус, когда ты была подле... но теперь, кажется, попраны все устои, на которых зиждется власть Вольных Торговцев, дарованная им Самим". {n}Абеляр взирает на Ардженту с выражением абсолютной ненависти, не прикрытой ни вежливостью, ни уважением.{/n}

I never doubted the safety of the Valancius bloodline when you were close, but now the very foundations on which the power of the Rogue Traders rests seem to have been violated." {n}Abelard looks at Argenta with an expression of absolute hatred, uncovered by either courtesy or respect.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lady Theodora... Mort... fell at the hand of the one meant to protect the servants of the God-Emperor. I never doubted the security of the von Valancius bloodline when you were close, but now the very foundations on which the power of the Rogue Traders rests seem to have been violated." {n}Abelard looks at Argenta with a visceral loathing in his eyes, uncovered by either courtesy or respect.{/n}

languages.text: 「レディ・シオドーラ…モートは…神帝陛下のしもべを守るはずの者の手によって倒れた。あなたが近くにいたころは、フォン・ヴァランシウスの血統の安全を疑ったことはなかったが、今や自由開拓者たちの力の基盤が侵害されているようだ」{n}アベラルドは、礼儀にも敬意にも表れない、本能的な嫌悪感をその目に宿してアルジェンタを見つめる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lady Theodora... Mort... fell at the hand of the one meant to protect the servants of the God-Emperor. I never doubted the security of the von Valancius bloodline when you were close, but now the very foundations on which the power of the Rogue Traders rests seem to have been violated." {n}Abelard looks at Argenta with a visceral loathing in his eyes, uncovered by either courtesy or respect.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「レディ・シオドーラ…モートは…神帝陛下のしもべを守るはずの者の手によって倒れた。あなたが近くにいたころは、フォン・ヴァランシウスの血統の安全を疑ったことはなかったが、今や自由開拓者たちの力の基盤が侵害されているようだ」{n}アベラルドは、礼儀にも敬意にも表れない、本能的な嫌悪感をその目に宿してアルジェンタを見つめる。{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “西奥多拉夫人……莫特……都死在了神皇的仆人手中。我曾坚信，以为只要你在我身边，冯·瓦兰修斯家族成员的生命安全就一定会得到保障。可现在，行商浪人权利的基石，似乎已经遭到了侵犯。”{n}阿贝拉德看着阿洁塔，眼中流露着发自内心的厌恶。无论是礼貌的语气还是尊重的态度，都无法掩饰他的厌恶之意。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lady Theodora... Mort... fell at the hand of the one meant to protect the servants of the God-Emperor. I never doubted the security of the von Valancius bloodline when you were close, but now the very foundations on which the power of the Rogue Traders rests seem to have been violated." {n}Abelard looks at Argenta with a visceral loathing in his eyes, uncovered by either courtesy or respect.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “西奥多拉夫人……莫特……都死在了神皇的仆人手中。我曾坚信，以为只要你在我身边，冯·瓦兰修斯家族成员的生命安全就一定会得到保障。可现在，行商浪人权利的基石，似乎已经遭到了侵犯。”{n}阿贝拉德看着阿洁塔，眼中流露着发自内心的厌恶。无论是礼貌还是尊重的态度，都无法掩饰他的厌恶之意。{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Lady Theodora... Mort... cayeron a manos de quien debía proteger a los siervos del Dios Emperador. Nunca dudé de la seguridad de la línea de sucesión de von Valancius cuando estaba cerca, pero ahora los mismos cimientos sobre los que descansa el poder de los Comerciantes Independientes parecen haber sido quebrados». {n}Abelard mira a Argenta con odio puro en sus ojos, sin respeto ni cortesía que lo acallen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lady Theodora... Mort... fell at the hand of the one meant to protect the servants of the God-Emperor. I never doubted the security of the von Valancius bloodline when you were close, but now the very foundations on which the power of the Rogue Traders rests seem to have been violated." {n}Abelard looks at Argenta with a visceral loathing in his eyes, uncovered by either courtesy or respect.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Lady Theodora... Mort... cayeron a manos de quien debía proteger a los siervos del Dios Emperador. Nunca dudé de la seguridad de la línea de sucesión de von Valancius cuando estaba cerca, pero ahora los mismos cimientos sobre los que descansa el poder de los Comerciantes Independientes parecen haber sido quebrados». {n}Abelard mira a Argenta con tal odio en sus ojos que no pueden esconderlo ni la cortesía ni el respeto.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Lady Theodora ... Mort ... gestorben durch die Hand, die eigentlich die Diener des Gottimperators beschützen sollte. Wenn Ihr in der Nähe wart, habe ich nie an der Sicherheit der Blutlinie derer von Valancius gezweifelt. Doch nun wurden offenbar die Grundmauern angegriffen, auf denen die Macht der Freihändler ruht." {n}Abelard blickt Argenta mit tiefgehendem Abscheu in die Augen, weder durch Höflichkeit noch durch Respekt verschleiert.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lady Theodora... Mort... fell at the hand of the one meant to protect the servants of the God-Emperor. I never doubted the security of the von Valancius bloodline when you were close, but now the very foundations on which the power of the Rogue Traders rests seem to have been violated." {n}Abelard looks at Argenta with a visceral loathing in his eyes, uncovered by either courtesy or respect.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Lady Theodora ... Mort ... gestorben durch die Hand, die eigentlich die Diener des Gottimperators beschützen sollte. Wenn Ihr in der Nähe wart, habe ich nie an der Sicherheit der Blutlinie derer von Valancius gezweifelt. Doch nun wurden offenbar die Grundmauern angegriffen, auf denen die Macht der Freihändler ruht. {n}Abelard blickt Argenta mit tiefgehendem Abscheu in die Augen, weder durch Höflichkeit noch durch Respekt verschleiert.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Dame Théodora... Tuée des mains de celle qui a voué sa vie à protéger les serviteurs de l'Empereur-Dieu... J'ai toujours cru la lignée von Valancius en sécurité à vos côtés, mais voilà qui ébranle les fondations mêmes sur lesquelles repose le pouvoir des libres-marchands. » {n}Abélard dévisage Argenta, son regard désormais dépourvu de la moindre trace de courtoisie ou de respect, mais au contraire animé d'une haine quasi viscérale.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lady Theodora... Mort... fell at the hand of the one meant to protect the servants of the God-Emperor. I never doubted the security of the von Valancius bloodline when you were close, but now the very foundations on which the power of the Rogue Traders rests seem to have been violated." {n}Abelard looks at Argenta with a visceral loathing in his eyes, uncovered by either courtesy or respect.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Dame Théodora... Tuée des mains de celle qui a voué sa vie à protéger les serviteurs de l'Empereur-Dieu... J'ai toujours cru la lignée von Valancius en sécurité à vos côtés, mais voilà qui ébranle les fondations mêmes sur lesquelles repose le pouvoir des libres-marchands. » {n}Abélard dévisage Argenta, son regard désormais dépourvu de la moindre trace de courtoisie ou de respect, mais au contraire animé d'une haine quasi viscérale.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Leydi Theodora... Tanrı İmparator'un hizmetkârlarını korumakla yükümlü şahsın elinde can verdi. Sen yanımızdayken von Valancius soyunun güvenliği konusunda hiç endişeye düşmemiştim. Fakat şimdi Hür Tacir'in kudretinin dayandığı temeller sarsılmış vaziyette." {n}Abelard, Argenta'ya tiksintiyle bakıyor. Gözlerinde saygıdan yahut nezaketten eser yok.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lady Theodora... Mort... fell at the hand of the one meant to protect the servants of the God-Emperor. I never doubted the security of the von Valancius bloodline when you were close, but now the very foundations on which the power of the Rogue Traders rests seem to have been violated." {n}Abelard looks at Argenta with a visceral loathing in his eyes, uncovered by either courtesy or respect.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Leydi Theodora... Mort... Tanrı İmparator'un hizmetkârlarını korumakla yükümlü şahıs, ikisinin de ölümüne sebep oldu. Senin varlığında von Valancius soyunun korunması konusunda hiç endişeye düşmemiştim. Fakat şimdi Hür Tacir'in kudreti için temel vazifesi gören ilkeler sarsılmış vaziyette." {n}Abelard, Argenta'ya tiksintiyle bakıyor. Gözlerinde saygıdan yahut nezaketten eser yok.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
